mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wanteds(title, detail, position_code_id, career_code_id, pay, enddate, created) VALUES(#{wantedTitle},#{wantedDetail},#{positionCodeId},#{careerCodeId},#{pay},#{enddate}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT w.id, pc.name, cc.name, w.title, c.company_name, '지역', IF(w.enddate > NOW(), '모집중', '마감') AS status FROM wanteds w <<<<<<< HEAD ======= LEFT OUTER JOIN companys c ON w.company_id = c.id LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT *, COUNT(user_id) like_count FROM likes GROUP BY wanted_id) l ON l.wanted_id = w.id WHERE w.enddate > NOW() AND c.id = #{id} ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 8

SELECT w.id, pc.name, cc.name, w.title, c.company_name, '지역', IF(w.enddate > NOW(), '모집중', '마감') AS status FROM wanteds w LEFT OUTER JOIN positions_code pc ON pc.id = w.position_code_id LEFT OUTER JOIN careers_code cc ON cc.id = w.career_code_id LEFT OUTER JOIN companys c ON c.id = w.company_id WHERE w.enddate > NOW() ORDER BY w.created DESC
